mapper.select: select count(*) as count from rent
select count(*) as count from rent where ${keyField} = #{keyword}

select c.car_type carType, c.car_num carNum, c.socar_zone socarZone, c.rent_amt rentAmt, c.car_img carImg, r.id id, r.start_date startDate, r.end_date endDate, r.rent_seq rentSeq, r.price price, r.status status, r.coupon_member_seq couponMemberSeq from rent r, car c where r.car_seq = c.car_seq and id = #{keyword} order by rent_seq desc

select * from( select @NO := @NO + 1 as ROWNUM, A.* from ( select r.rent_seq rentSeq, r.start_date startDate, r.end_date endDate, r.car_seq carSeq, r.coupon_member_seq couponMemberSeq, r.status status from rent r where ${keyField} = #{keyword} order by rent_seq desc )A, (select @NO := 0)B )C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{start} and #{end};
update rent set status ='Y' where rent_seq = #{keyword}
update coupon_member set use_flag='N' where coupon_member_seq = ${keyword};
